name: Hue will be the death of xx
name_original: Hue will be the death of xx
description:
This is the story of Magenta, a color who used to have true credibility, until recent technologies displayed that the color is "simply an optical illusion." Once it got kicked out of the 7 colors of the rainbow (and the visible light spectrum), it gradually faded from memory and ceased to be. Eternities later, a re-awakened yet slightly ghastly, selectively color-blind Magenta seeks to find the truth of who they are... or who they were.

A submission for MiniJam 111: Colors!
